item.title: Autocad-5 : 7 Dimension tricks you need to know about.
item.author: michtintin
item.description: 7 Dimension tricks you need to know about. Introduction. 00:00-00:49:08 Hi, How’s it going? Today I’ll be showing you how to do Dimension using shortcuts. So I have a row of boxes here to dimension Usually beginners will dimension this way. You’ll go and click dimension and then turning on Object Snap, you will click each point one by one, making sure that they are aligned, and this is really time consuming.
